alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:45PM CST until January 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Obion...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 31.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
